TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create, update and exchange a (large) CommentText for an Organisation in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Organisation with a CommentText element. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the CommentText. Nation B receives and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic, which includes message elements belonging in the Organisation message schema area.Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if every CommentText is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an Organisation message element with CommentText element containing more than 2000 characters.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation and the comments correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the comment; the resulting text is less than 2000 characters.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation and the comments correctly.
